data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the county of Mirzapur a passion to plant another simple church.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mirzapur, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Mirzapur, Uttar Pradesh, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 27,467 believers in Mirzapur against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Jesus, defend your people in the county of Mirzapur against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Brahmin Maithili people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Brahmin Maithili people.
Father, guide the church in Mirzapur, Uttar Pradesh, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Mirzapur, Uttar Pradesh, India to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.section_summary:
the county of Mirzapur, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 2,497,000.

We estimate Mirzapur has 27,467 people who might know Jesus, 30,297 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,439,236 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Mirzapur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
